H0.text: Kingdom is the broadest category in the Linnaean system.

H1.text: Phylum is the broadest category in the Linnaean system.

H2.text: Class is the broadest category in the Linnaean system.

H3.text: Domain is the broadest category in the Linnaean system.

A4.text: Species can be placed in a ranked hierarchy, starting with either domains or kingdoms. Domains are divided into kingdoms.
